critique: The document expresses concern and determination regarding the impact of school closures on children due to the COVID-19 pandemic. It highlights the negative consequences on education, health, and well-being, especially for vulnerable populations. The document conveys sadness and concern about the situation, but also a sense of resolve to address the issues. There is a slight sense of disgust at the failure to provide in-person learning options. There is no explicit expression of joy or surprise.
